VIKRAM SINGH
Senior Management Consultant
Bengaluru, India | vikram.singh@email.com | +91-9XXXXXXXXX
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Senior Consultant with over 15 years of experience delivering strategic, operational, and digital transformation
initiatives across banking, technology, manufacturing, and professional services sectors. Proven ability to lead
large-scale consulting engagements, advise C-level stakeholders, and drive measurable business outcomes.
Strong expertise in business strategy, process optimization, data-driven decision-making, and change
management.
CORE CONSULTING EXPERTISE
(cid:127) Business & Corporate Strategy
(cid:127) Digital Transformation & Process Reengineering
(cid:127) Operating Model Design
(cid:127) Program & Change Management
(cid:127) Data Analytics & Performance Management
(cid:127) Stakeholder & Executive Advisory
(cid:127) Financial Modeling & Business Case Development
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Senior Consultant – Alpha Consulting Group (2016 – Present)
(cid:127) Lead multi-disciplinary consulting engagements for Fortune 500 and mid-sized enterprises across India and
Southeast Asia.
(cid:127) Advise CXOs on strategy formulation, operating model redesign, and digital transformation initiatives.
(cid:127) Delivered transformation programs resulting in cost reductions of up to 22% and productivity improvements
exceeding 30%.
(cid:127) Manage project teams, budgets, timelines, and client communication to ensure successful delivery.

(cid:127) Designed enterprise-wide KPI frameworks and performance dashboards to enable data-driven decision-making
for senior leadership.
(cid:127) Conducted market assessments, competitor benchmarking, and financial analysis to support strategic
investment decisions.
(cid:127) Partnered with client leadership to manage change initiatives, including communication planning and capability
building.
(cid:127) Mentored junior consultants and analysts, providing guidance on problem-solving, client engagement, and
professional development.
Consultant – Beta Advisory Services (2010 – 2016)
(cid:127) Supported large consulting engagements focused on operational excellence, cost optimization, and process
improvement.
(cid:127) Led workstreams involving business process mapping, gap analysis, and solution design across finance,
operations, and IT functions.
(cid:127) Developed detailed business cases, implementation roadmaps, and executive presentations for senior
stakeholders.
(cid:127) Collaborated closely with client teams to ensure practical and sustainable solutions were implemented.
KEY ENGAGEMENTS
(cid:127) Core Banking Transformation Program – Tier-1 Bank
(cid:127) ERP Implementation & Process Redesign – Manufacturing Client
(cid:127) Enterprise Cost Optimization – Professional Services Firm
(cid:127) Data & Analytics Strategy – Retail Organization

EDUCATION
(cid:127) Master of Business Administration (Strategy & Operations) – IIM Bangalore
(cid:127) Bachelor of Engineering – Computer Science
CERTIFICATIONS
(cid:127) PMP – Project Management Professional
(cid:127) Certified Management Consultant (CMC)
(cid:127) Lean Six Sigma Black Belt
PUBLICATIONS & THOUGHT LEADERSHIP
(cid:127) Published articles on digital transformation and operational excellence in leading business journals.
(cid:127) Regular speaker at industry conferences and corporate leadership forums.
KEY ACHIEVEMENTS
(cid:127) Successfully led consulting programs exceeding INR 100 Crores in value.
(cid:127) Recognized as “Top Performer – Consulting Excellence” multiple times.
(cid:127) Built and scaled high-performing consulting teams across regions.
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
(cid:127) Strong executive presence and communication skills
(cid:127) Extensive experience working with global clients
(cid:127) Passionate about mentoring and capability building
